title: Amber Rudd confirms she will not stand in General Election
text:
Amber Rudd says she isn’t finished with politics (Picture: AFP)

Former Cabinet minister Amber Rudd has announced she will not stand in the December General Election.

The Conservative MP told the Evening Standard she is ‘not finished with politics’ but is just standing down for this election.

She previously resigned form the Cabinet in solidarity with 21 other Tory rebels who voted to prevent a no-deal Brexit earlier this year.

This is a breaking news story, more to follow soon…

description: Former Cabinet minister Amber Rudd has announced she will not stand in the December General Election.
